ygData.subject: RE: Song Taunt (OT) <= Very OT
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There s an awesome game based on it (called Rainbow Six of all things :), with a multiplayer mode.  Folks here at work usually play with the speaker phones
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 4 Feb 2000, John Tatsukawa wrote:
>
> The flip side to that is a lot like what I've read in Rainbow Six by Tom
> Clancy which deals with commando's vs terrorists. There's a situation. You
> set up a plan and each person has a task/job. You adapt to the circumstances
> in an environment full with lethal combat results.
>
> If there was a MUD with this latter profile, I can't imagine getting pickup
> groups together as it really would take excellent team coordination, and
> it'd probably be best to have voice communications.

There's an awesome game based on it (called Rainbow Six of all
things :), with a multiplayer mode. Folks here at work
usually play with the speaker phones in conference call mode.
It really does require good teamwork, and one person screwing
up usually results in everyone dying.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
